page.title: 03DUNDONALD NEWS, JUNE, 1985
page.content: { This week's main news is that a local youth has been charged with a murder committed on May 2nd on nearby Troon beach. A girl's body has been found on some rocks this week on June 1st. The youth had also been charged with an earlier local murder. On Monday 3rd June,Dundonald Primary School netball and football teams played a "friendly" match against nearby Muirhead Primary School. Both Dundonald teams won. It was announced this week that to celebrate the 75th anniversary of the founding of the Girl Guide Movement, Dundonald guides will attend a giant party to be held at Ayr Racecourse. Guides from all over Scotland will take part.
